name: Nueva canción
description: Latin American (Nueva canción latinoamericana) and Spanish (Nueva canción española) movement during the 1960s and 1970s.

children.name: Nueva canción española
children.description: Arose in Spain in the 1960s, inspired in part by Nova cançó's reclaiming of Catalan regional identity, that spread across the country in regional variations.

children.name: Nueva canción española
children.description: Arose in Spain in the 1960s, inspired in part by Nova cançó's reclaiming of Catalan regional identity, that spread across the country in regional variations.

children.name: Nueva canción española

children.name: Nueva canción latinoamericana
children.description: Politically-charged messages associated with the rise of leftist social movements; striving for a renewal of traditional Latin and Hispanic American Folk Music expressions.
